job_to_be_done.task: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.text:   1 pound ground beef    1 small onion, diced    2 cloves garlic, minced    1 carrot, grated    1 celery stalk, diced    1 can (28 ounces) crushed tomatoes    1/4 cup tomato paste    1/2 cup red wine (optional)    1 teaspoon dried oregano    1 teaspoon dried basil    Salt and pepper to taste    Spaghetti for serving    Grated Parmesan cheese for garnish  Instructions:
o Slice tomatoes and mozzarella.  o Arrange on a plate, alternating slices.  o Sprinkle with chopped basil, olive oil, balsamic glaze, and salt.  o Serve immediately.    Carrot Salad

o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion.  o Mix vegetables with olives and crumbled feta cheese.  o Whisk olive oil, vinegar, oregano, and salt, then pour over salad.  o Toss well and serve.    Green Bean Casserole
•  In a bowl, combine cottage cheese, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and bell pepper.  •  Season with salt and pepper.  •  Serve immediately.

o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion.  o Blanch green beans until tender.  o Arrange tomatoes, cucumber, onion, green beans, olives, and tuna on a plate.  o Quarter hard-boiled eggs and add to the salad.  o Whisk olive oil, vinegar, mustard, and salt, then drizzle over the salad.  o Toss gently and serve.
